dc:title: Day After Day - April 1937
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes those who deny Christ in His poor as "atheists indeed." Blames well-off "professing Christians" for repelling those with no religion. Quotes from a pamphlet given to the men in the breadline about Christ being their brother and His poverty.
